text: input Input file render Docker container. tag Docker image name build, sent docker argument -t. specified, use name input file. container_name Docker container name run. specified, use randomly generated name. cache Logical. Controls ---cache argument docker run. Setting TRUE can accelerate rendering speed substantially repeated/interactive rendering since Docker image layers cached, changed (knitr related) image layer updated. Default TRUE. build_args character string specifying additional docker build arguments. example, --pull=true -m="1024m" --memory-swap="-1". run_args character string specifying additional docker run arguments. example, --privileged=true. prune Logical. clean dangling containers, volumes, networks, images case rendering successful? Default TRUE. prune_info Logical. save Docker container image information YAML file (name ended .docker.yml) manual pruning inspections later? Default TRUE. dry_run Preview Docker commands run ?
